text: Coffee and Cigarettes is a 2003 American Japanese Italian comedy movie directed by Jim Jarmusch and starring Roberto Benigni, Steven Wright, Steve Buscemi, Iggy Pop, Tom Waits, Cate Blanchett, Meg White, Jack White, Steve Coogan. It was distributed by United Artists. ==Other websites== * * Category:2003 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Japanese comedy movies Category:Italian comedy movies Category:Movies about smoking Category:Movies directed by Jim Jarmusch
title: Coffee and Cigarettes
